🎮【FREE 10000 GAMES】 Built in 10000 classic games, all original and no repeat. Can download games with related format.
🎮【LARGE SCREEN】 Large clearfull color TFT LCD screen with 16:9 display scale. Double protection with scratchproof and anti-fall, brings exciting gaming experience and better eye protection.

🎮【CUSTOMIZED SYSTEM】 Customized Professional Console System, English default set and Save & Load features. Very easy to use and don't worry about the game is interrupted suddenly to make you start again.
🎮【VERSATILE CONSOLE】 Not only a Game Console but also Music Player, Video Player, Camera, DV, Recorder, Photo Viewer, E-book. Can connect to PC with USB cable and download your favorite games.
body.description: Package Contents: 1 x Game Console 1 x USB Data/Charging Cable 1 x HDMI TV Output Cable 1 x Earphone 1 x User Manual Description: -Functions: Game Console / Music Player / Video Player / Camera / Photo Viewer -Languages: Multi-language -Game Quantity: 10000 Games -Game Formats: PS1/MAME/FBA/NEOGEO/GBA/GBC/GB/NES/SNES/MD -Music Formats: MP3/WMA/APE/FLAC/WAV -Video Formats: RMVB/MP4/AVI/FLV -Images Formats: JPEG/BMP/GIF/TIF/PNG -Screen Display: TFT LCD Screen -Built-in: Speaker, Microphone, Camera, Li Battery -Interface: TF Card Slot, 3.5mm Earphone, HDMI TV Output, Mini USB (data/charging port), Micro USB (for wireless gamepads) -Memory : Built-in 8GB Memory, Supports expandable up to 32GB with TF Card

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my younger brother as a birthday gift. It's honestly quite a nice game console, nothing less than I expected. It's nice, he loves it !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There arent really many good games, some of the games dont work, there are thousands of repeats, its not user friendly and it feels cheapy.I would reccomend going with a different seller. I got another one that is modelled after a gba sp and i feel the opposite about it. Much better quality and its actually cheaper lol

reviews.reviewText: My son wanted a switch, but I bought him this. He has been playing it since received for Christmas. 10,000 games. Said some repeatative but enjoying it nevertheless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There is porn on it and metal gear doesn't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Interesting little handheld console, for the price
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know anything about handheld game consoles like the Switch, so I can’t compare this to those. As an old school game player, I was pleasantly surprised to find emulators preinstalled for Playstation 1, NES, Gameboy/Color/Advanced, NEOGEO, MAME, and a couple others I don’t recognize. The device comes with internal storage and a 32GB micro SD card nearly full with games for all of the emulators. I was able to copy the supplied game card over to a 64GB SD card on a PC, which left plenty of room to add additional games/roms. My favorite thing is the MAME emulation, I dropped a few hundred old MAME ROM images I have had for over 20 years, and although they didn’t all work, many did, allowing me to enjoy again some of the games I enjoyed in my youth at the arcade. The controls aren’t great but they are adequate. The side to side viewing angle is surprisingly good for a screen of this size and price, although as might be expected the screen washes out quickly if tilted even slightly up or down.Like I said I can’t say how a kid would react to this compared to one of the fancier modern consoles, but for basically the price of a restaurant meal for two I find this to be a decent bargain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WARNING-This thing has Anime porn
reviews.reviewText: As the title reads this game system has many "games" but some are not games. Some are dirty nude pictures or anime porn or advertising for god knows what. You will want to plug this unit into a PC with good antivirus and start cleaning up files that don't have actual game titles. Some of these files outright say "porno" on it and if you play it through the system you will see dirty pictures. Off hand I went through the SNES folder in the external memory of this game system and there were at lease 50 files like this .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of good games from all different consoles
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son, even my husband likes it lol he said it’s super cool even has resident evil 3 and a bunch of cool games like that from all different systems. Don’t have to have inter to use it or download anything so I don’t know why anyone would even want an Nintendo switch anymore 😂 especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
